markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="">[Conqueror Worm](/Deities.aspx?ID=234)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 67</row>

Individual conqueror worms are lesser deities, capable of granting spells to those who worship them. Often, the conqueror worm's clerics are the only ones in its vast network of hidden agents and depraved cults with an inkling as to the nature of the malevolent creature pulling the strings. While individual conqueror worms have diferent edicts, anathema, and favored weapons beftting their personalities, the following is common among conqueror worms

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** manipulate those in power, foster psychic abilities, endorse unjust laws

**Anathema** enact hasty schemes, tell the truth except to nurture a larger lie, reveal those higher in the conqueror worm's network

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=28), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=33)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

- **5th**
[Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193)

- **7th**
[Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369)

</column>
name: Conqueror Worm
